confidence_rubric.low: blogs, reviews, EU sources for US products, conflicting data

terrain_definitions.smooth: paved surfaces, indoor, mall floors, sidewalks
terrain_definitions.urban: curbs, brick, light cobblestone, standard city streets
terrain_definitions.jogging: manufacturer explicitly rates stroller for running; typically requires locked front wheel
terrain_definitions.all_terrain: REQUIRES: air-filled tires + suspension + manufacturer claims off-road capability; if not all verified, use light_uneven instead

intended_use_category.full_size: standard everyday stroller for urban/suburban use
intended_use_category.jogging: designed and rated for running; typically 3-wheel with locking front

fold_mechanism.one_hand: single action, achievable with one hand
fold_mechanism.two_step: requires two distinct actions to complete

fold_characteristics.cabin_approved: verified to fit airline overhead bins

recommendation_rules.low_confidence_usage: display only; not for comparisons or rankings
recommendation_rules.region_mismatch_handling: fields with excluded_from_recommendations=true should not influence rankings
